snippet: Thomas C. Baxter Jr., who helped devise both Wall Street bailouts and enforcement actions against banks that broke the law, plans to leave the New York Fed in September.
lead_paragraph: Thomas C. Baxter Jr., who helped devise both Wall Street bailouts and enforcement actions against banks that broke the law, plans to leave the New York Fed in September.

headline.main: Fed Lawyer Who Helped Bail Out, and Regulate, Wall St. Will Retire
